identifiers.title: Additional tender identifiers
identifiers.description: Additional identifiers for this tender. This field can be used to provide local identifiers for the tender.

exclusionGrounds.title: Exclusion grounds
exclusionGrounds.description: The criteria regarding the situation of a tenderer that can lead to its exclusion from the contracting process. For example: criminal convictions, bankruptcy, presence on a blacklist or failure to pay taxes.

maximumValue.title: Maximum value
maximumValue.description: The estimated maximum value of the framework agreement, as a whole, as estimated when making the award.

estimatedValue.title: Estimated value
estimatedValue.description: The estimated value of the framework agreement, as a whole, as estimated when making the award.

identifiers.title: Additional contract identifiers
identifiers.description: Additional identifiers for this contract. This field can be used to provide local identifiers for the contract.

languages.title: Languages
languages.description: The languages used in the document, from the open [language](https://standard.open-contracting.org/{{version}}/{{lang}}/schema/codelists/#language) codelist. A [BCP47 language tag](https://www.w3.org/International/articles/language-tags/) is allowed, if there is a user need for the additional information.

SimpleIdentifier.title: Simple identifier
SimpleIdentifier.description: An unambiguous reference to a resource within a given context.

scheme.title: Scheme
scheme.description: The list, register or system from which the identifier is taken.

id.title: ID
id.description: The identifier taken from the scheme.
